item.title: Mmmmm… clean, sweet WCF proxy usage with TidyProxy!
item.description: Everyone knows (hopefully) how WCF has made multi-tiered application development easier and cleaner.  You get nicely generated client proxies that reuse common libraries straight out of Visual Studio – no more having to convert between your DTOs and the Web Service DTOs.  They even implement IDisposable - you can just wrap them in using statements and you’re good to go!  How neat is that! 1: using (var proxy = new TidyProxy<SomeWCFServiceClient>()) 2: { 3: proxy.
